content.question: One important purpose of the passage is to

choices.label: urge the public to contribute money to a proposed taxonomy project
suggest that ecological conservation is a beneficial enterprise
question why some species are better protected than others
promote specific organizations devoted to improving global well-being

content.answer: suggest that ecological conservation is a beneficial enterprise

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
